title: Hospitals Share Risk to Fight Virus, AstraZeneca Vaccine Faces Delay, Powell Channels Greenspan
itunes:title: Hospitals Share Risk to Fight Virus, AstraZeneca Vaccine Faces Delay, Powell Channels Greenspan
description:
Alyssa Rapp, CEO of Surgical Solutions, discusses how healthcare systems are collaborating to assist each other to handle the Covid-19 outbreak. Bloomberg News Health Reporter Michelle Cortez explains that AstraZeneca's vaccine tests face a delay after a patient gets ill. Bloomberg Economics Reporter Rich Miller talks about Federal Reserve Chairman Jay Powell making no secret of his admiration for Alan Greenspan and how his Fed is looking a lot like that of the man once dubbed the monetary maestro. Bloomberg News Sustainability Editor Eric Roston shares the climate science people may have missed because they've been focused on the pandemic. And we Drive to the Close with Hank Smith, Head of Investment Strategy at Haverford Trust Company.

Hosts: Carol Masar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
